BLHar629.Transcription:
Pees maketh plentePlente maketh pridePride maketh pleePlee
                    maketh pouertePouerte maketh pees And therforeGrace growith after
                    gouernance
BLHar629.Note:
Written after 4080 by same scribe, all in rubric; sixth line,
                    ‘And therfore’, written to right of lines 1-5, with seventh line,
                    ‘Grace growith after gouernance’ below lined up to left margin as
                    lines 1-5.

TCD432.First Lines:
Pees maketh plente in euerych a place& plente makeþ pride
                    man so haue I grace…

                    he neuer þryve þat vseþ ple or pride
